epp:phrases.epp:phrase:
Unrecognised .
No or unrecognised response from remote service.

Incorrect format of supplied id .
Provide DOIs or Scopus EIDs. A DOI starts with "10.", a Scopus EID starts with "2-s2.0-".
The Scopus record contains many authors/editors. The import was limited to the first names and "et al" was added. You can add further names to the imported record in Manage Deposits.

Enter either a DOI, a Scopus EID, or several DOIs/EIDs, one per line. A DOI starts with "10.", a Scopus EID starts with "2-s2.0-". Examples:
10.3205/zma001161
2-s2.0-85049403160
